text:
Top 15 Games That Are Like Clash of Clans Published Updated 2:10 pm EST, October 7, 2014 110 Comments By Elton Jones 35.3k Share Tweet Follow 
Clash of Clans has blossomed into one of the best, most involving strategy games for mobile devices. Players have the ability to defend their constantly growing kingdom while also defending it from invading forces. 
The 2D visuals and hilariously styled army grunts welcome mobile players to the game with open arms. Clash of Clans is an undeniable hit. 
If you can’t get enough Clash of Clans , then make sure you pay extra attention to these 15 games. These mobile titles adopt the same elements that makes Clash of Clans so addictive. 15. Total Conquest 
Total Conquest Roman Empire theme fits perfectly with empire management and epic military skirmishes. 14. Battle Beach 
Battle Beach entails some familiar elements of the game its based on, but it utilizes modern weaponry and military alliances. 13. Clan War HD 
Clan War HD could be mistaken for a carbon copy of Clash of Clans . And you know what? That sentiment actually rings true. 12. Battle Dragons 
Battle Dragons dragons, goal limits and the cool option to attack your own village makes this mobile strategy title stand out. Test the limits of your fort in this Clash of Clans -esque game. 11. Samurai Siege 
Samurai Siege employs the usage of samurai’s for its fort construction and massive battles. This siege is worth investing in. Elton Jones is a senior contributor to Heavy who covers gaming, pro wrestling, movies and pop culture. He lives in New York City. October 7, 2014 2:10 pm
